original_item.body:
Hi Mark,

Hope you're well! Alex has been performing excellently and has integrated well with our international team.

Due to our rapid expansion success, we need another AI Developer to join our international team. The role is similar to Alex's position:

- Mid-level AI Developer (2-4 years experience)
- Computer vision and deep learning focus
- Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch proficiency
- Natural language processing skills (new requirement)
- Budget: $75-85K annually
- Start date: September 15th, 2024
- Project: Multi-language sentiment analysis for international markets

Can you help us find another strong candidate? We're looking to move quickly on this.

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
CTO, SolarisProAi
original_item.subject: Urgent: Additional AI Developer Required

analysis.suggested_action: Source candidates for a Mid-level AI Developer with NLP skills
analysis.relevance: Client has a new, urgent hiring need due to successful expansion.
analysis.suggested_reply:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for reaching out! I understand the urgency and will start sourcing candidates for the Mid-level AI Developer position right away. I'll keep you updated on the progress.

Best,
Mark
